org.fcrepo.serialization

Class JcrXmlSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.serialization.BaseFedoraObjectSerializer
      • org.fcrepo.serialization.JcrXmlSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FedoraObjectSerializer

    @Component
public class JcrXmlSerializer
extends BaseFedoraObjectSerializer
    Serialize a FedoraObject using the modeshape-provided JCR/XML format
